description: Episode number 7 of Series "Jesus of Nazareth". The continuing story of the life of Jesus of Nazareth from: the shame of Mary Magdalene; the Rich Young Man approaches Jesus; the miracle of the loaves and the fishes; Zealots and Judas discuss the work of Jesus; Simon the Zealot follows Jesus; in the house of Simon the Pharisee; Joseph of Arimathea converses with Jesus; Mary Magdelene washes Jesus' feet with her hair, Jesus forgives her sins.
related_objects: Series; S01277; Jesus of Nazareth; Active; 1977
